snippet: Shellie Zimmerman, the wife of George Zimmerman, filed for divorce less than two months after he was acquitted of murdering Trayvon Martin and a week after she pleaded guilty to perjury in his case.
abstract: Shellie Zimmerman, wife of George Zimmerman, files for divorce less than two months after he was acquitted of murdering Trayvon Martin and a week after she pleaded guilty to perjury in his case.
lead_paragraph: Shellie Zimmerman, the wife of George Zimmerman, filed for divorce less than two months after he was acquitted of murdering Trayvon Martin and a week after she pleaded guilty to perjury in his case.
